interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/01/20 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English (UK) [CC]', 'English (US) [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt'], 'Directors': ['Phil Churchward', 'Kit Lynch Robinson', 'Brian Klein', 'Gavin Whitehead'], 'Producers': ['Andy Wilman'], 'Starring': ['James May', 'Jeremy Clarkson', 'Richard Hammond'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: Good to see the British goofballs back to slamming cars around tracks and roads and showing some of the most beautiful scenery in the world.
Great goofy humor with their typical bias British slant on everything. They're looking older and pudgier but great to see familiar faces. They still show cars that 95% of common people can't afford but are interesting to watch. Love the road trips. Hope to see another American muscle car trip across America. Keep up the good work boys. Review Title: Great to see the British goofballs back again. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Dark, gritty but addictive Mad Dogs Suspense, Comedy, Drama ['When a group of underachieving 40-something friends gather in Belize to celebrate the early retirement of an old friend, a series of wild events unfold, exposing dark secrets, deception and even murder.'] {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Deutsch'], 'Subtitles': ['English (UK) [CC]', 'English (US) [CC]', 'Deutsch'], 'Directors': ['Charles McDougall'], 'Producers': ['Shawn Ryan', 'Cris Cole'], 'Starring': ['Ben Chaplin', 'Michael Imperioli', 'Romany Malco']} A lot of ups and downs. Gives you an insecure feeling about traveling outside the country. Intense moments some violence.
Leaves you relieved but depressed. They still show cars that 95% of common people can't afford but are interesting to watch. Love the road trips. Hope to see another American muscle car trip across America. Keep up the good work boys. Great to see the British goofballs back again.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preferences:** The user continues to favor thought-provoking narratives that blend suspense, drama, and dark humor, but their recent interaction reveals an enjoyment of lighthearted, comedic content featuring familiar personalities in adventurous settings. They appreciate narratives that maintain engagement through humor while showcasing beautifully rendered visuals.

- **Genre Inclination:** The user remains drawn to complex storytelling across various genres but now also exhibits an interest in comedic entertainment that features engaging characters in unconventional scenarios, reflecting a broader taste for joyful exploration alongside emotional depth.

- **Content Advisory Sensitivity:** The user retains their sharp awareness of mature themes. However, in their latest review, they showcase an openness to narratives that incorporate humor and lightheartedness, indicating a balanced perspective on serious and entertaining content.

- **Language and Accessibility:** Preferences for English audio with various subtitle options continue, allowing for accessibility in both comedic and dramatic interactions.

- **Director and Production Value:** The user expresses a sustained interest in quality productions led by acclaimed filmmakers while now also giving weight to established personalities from lighter, comedic contexts, appreciating both high production values and charismatic performances.

Overall, the user seeks a diverse range of intellectually engaging and high-quality content, blending complexity with accessibility, while also embracing lighthearted adventures that provide escapism and entertainment.
